```pddl
[
  '(:action find ; Find a resource and update its status
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?target - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?target) (not (found ?agent ?target)))
  :effect (found ?agent ?target)
)',

  '(:action collect_twigs_and_sticks
  :parameters (?p - agent ?loc - location ?stick - stick)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (scattered ?stick ?loc))
  :effect (and (inventory ?p ?stick) (not (scattered ?stick ?loc)))
)',

  '(:action collect ; Collect an item from a location and add it to the inventory
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?loc - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?loc) (scattered ?item ?loc))
  :effect (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (not (scattered ?item ?loc)))
)',

  '(:action create
  :parameters (?p - agent ?loc - location ?item - object ?structure - structure)
  :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) 
                     (or (inventory ?p ?item) (in_formation ?item ?structure)))
  :effect (and (or (in_formation ?item ?structure) (built ?structure ?item)))
)',

  '(:action use ; Use a material to modify or fortify an entity
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - entity ?material - material)
  :precondition (and (available ?agent) (at ?agent ?entity) (or (leaf ?material) (bark ?material)) (built ?entity))
  :effect (fortified ?entity ?material)
)',

  '(:action decorate ; Decorate an entity and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?decoration - object ?loc - location ?actor - agent)
  :precondition (and (at ?actor ?loc) (built ?entity) (not (decorated ?entity ?decoration)))
  :effect (decorated ?entity ?decoration)
)'
]
```
